My mom is an extraordinary woman. Gracious, strong, patient, intelligent and caring. She raised 6 kids to love one another as best friends for life, and she and my dad are solid examples of partners for life. I’m so blessed to have her as my mother. 
#HappyMothersDay to all moms! https://t.co/BAft9n8kne
